attributes.action: Dissolve Parliament and sack all MPS.
attributes.additional_details: The conservatives continually told us that what ever the outcome of the referendum they would deliver what the people voted for. Even after the voting was done and counting was over they still continued to tell us the British Public they would deliver; three years on and they have failed failed to deliver what was voted for, failed to keep to their promises and failed to leave the EU.The politicians have made this country look like a Great Joke! and not the Great Britain we really are. FAILED US
attributes.background: Whether you are a remainer or a leaver MPS have not done their job and have failed the British public.I vote for dissolving Parliament sacking all politicians and starting again with a government that will deliver what was voted for in the referendum. Whether you like it or not democracy has to win
